name: MENKO EVOLUTION TOKEN
description:
Welcome to Menko Evolution.

These tokens possess immense power, and can be used to evolve your Menko cards. 

Once an evolution token is purchased, a Menko + one evolution token can be transferred to the address:

 tz1V2ziyEQVE2v1U4v8qJCX8E7MXMzUx8qfX
 
where it will be respawned into a brand new level 1 Menko, immortalised as a 1/1 with its owner's wallet address, solidifying his place in the Menko saga.

Evolution of a menko will also provide it with additional utility as the future of Crypto Menko unfolds.
